trans-unit.resname: F13·8 | Dimir Charm | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Choose one —
• Counter target sorcery spell.
• Destroy target creature with power 2 or less.
• Look at the top three cards of target player's library. Put one back and the rest into that player's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～反击目标法术咒语；或消灭目标力量小于或等于2的生物；或检视目标牌手牌库顶的三张牌，然后将一张放回，其余则置入该牌手的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: F13·9 | Experiment One | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
trans-unit.target: 进化（每当一个生物在你操控下进战场时，若该生物的力量或防御力大于此生物，则在后者上放置一个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: F13·9 | Experiment One | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Remove two +1/+1 counters from CARDNAME: Regenerate CARDNAME. (The next time this creature would be destroyed, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.)
trans-unit.target: 从CARDNAME上移去两个+1/+1指示物：重生CARDNAME。（此生物下一次将被消灭时，改为将它横置、移出战斗，并治愈其上所有伤害。）

trans-unit.resname: F13·10 | Ghor-Clan Rampager | Card Text | Paragraph 1
F13·10 | Ghor-Clan Rampager | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Bloodrush — {R}{G}, Discard CARDNAME: Target attacking creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 血激～{R}{G}，弃掉CARDNAME：直到回合结束，目标进行攻击的生物得+4/+4且获得践踏异能。

trans-unit.resname: F13·12 | Sin Collector | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose an instant or sorcery card from it and exile that card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，目标对手展示其手牌。你选择其中一张瞬间或法术牌，并放逐该牌。
